name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Mosaic of Global Sounds**  

The 2026 edition of Footprints Festival continues its tradition of showcasing a diverse and eclectic lineup, featuring 11 artists from 10 countries. With acts hailing from Germany, Iran, Nigeria, Brazil, Turkey, and beyond, the festival embraces a truly global ethos. The genres represented are as varied as the countries, spanning Electronic, Jazz, Psychedelic, Indie Pop, Malian Desert Blues, Anatolian Rock, and more, creating a rich tapestry of sound that promises something for every music lover.  

Diversity shines not only in music but also in representation. Seven of the acts feature artists of color, and the lineup includes a mix of female, male, and mixed-gender groups. Footprints Festival highlights the importance of inclusion, creating a space where traditional Iranian melodies and Armenian folk can share the stage with Afrobeat, 80s-inspired grooves, and minimalist electropop.  

With an impressive average rating of 7.73 and a majority of artists rated between 8 and 9, the festival promises high-caliber performances. Each act has a Spotify presence, making it easy for attendees to explore the lineup in advance. Footprints Festival 2026 is set to be a celebration of cultural and musical convergence, offering a vibrant, boundary-pushing experience for all.
